description: Tynwald rules all sub-post office branches on the Isle of Man must be kept open until July.
title: Loss-making Isle of Man sub-post offices given seven-month reprieve
title_page: Loss-making Isle of Man sub-post offices given seven-month reprieve - BBC News
maintext: The committee, which was set up to look into social inclusion and the provision of services within the island's towns and villages, is due to report to the council of ministers in the spring before being debated by Tynwald in July.
